entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon and ending late in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
